name: Pointe Chevalier: Siren's Map Restored
description:
Fragments unfurl across water. 10 stars, 5 glyphs, 1 spiral. The map spells 'SIREN MAP PRASLIN ISLES.'

Riddle: "When sea and sky agree, read the music."

Sophisticated painterly artwork using etched-parchment technique with Seychellois cultural motifs. Part of "The Siren's Map of Praslin" cipher series.
